summary: TAKATA REALL - OVER A YEAR THE ISSUE IS STILL UNRESOLVED.  WHAT DOES YOUR OFFICE RECOMMEND?  HOW UNSAFE DOES YOUR OFFICE BELIEVE THE VEHICLE IS TO DRIVE? HOW LONG DID YOUR OFFICE ALLOW FORD TO FIX THIS SAFETY ISSUE?  ALSO, I RECEIVED THE 15S21 RECALL (DRIVER SIDE AIR BAG) ON THE FAMILIES FORD MUSTANG 2007; HOWEVER, A 15S21 RECALL WAS NEVER RECEIVED ON THE 2008 FUSION (DRIVER SIDE AIR BAG) WHY?
